footnotes: Haya ni mambo yaliyo wafika Firauni na waheshimiwa wake. Ama wale wachawi Haki iliangaza kwao, na wakaanguka kwa kumsujudia Mwenyezi Mungu nao wanainyenyekea Haki.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
